Scopri l'eccellenza della serie **Giotto plus+** con Bandella dritta occhio centrale per legno. Realizzato in pregiato **Ferro**, rappresenta la soluzione ideale per chi cerca affidabilit√† e durata nel tempo. Il design raffinato si unisce a prestazioni superiori, garantendoti un'installazione impeccabile su porte e finestre in legno o alluminio. Ogni Bandelle alla vicentina viene prodotto artigianalmente nelle nostre officine delle Dolomiti, con controlli qualit√† rigorosi in ogni fase della lavorazione. La finitura Nero si integra perfettamente con qualsiasi stile d'arredo, mentre la struttura in Ferro assicura resistenza agli agenti atmosferici e all'usura quotidiana. La superficie liscia e uniforme testimonia l'eccellenza della lavorazione artigianale. Con dimensioni di 10 cm e diametro 12 mm, questa bandella si adatta perfettamente alle installazioni standard, garantendo movimenti fluidi e silenziosi. L'installazione su legno e alluminio risulta semplice e veloce grazie al sistema di fissaggio ottimizzato che assicura stabilit√† e durata nel tempo. --- ## üáÆüáπ Eccellenza Italiana **Tradizione artigiana e qualit√† superiore** Ogni Bandelle alla vicentina racchiude 40 anni di esperienza nella lavorazione dei metalli. en_us.html:
Discover the excellence of the **"Giotto plus+"** series with our Straight hinge central eye for wood. Crafted from premium **Iron**, it represents the ideal solution for those seeking reliability and long-lasting performance. Its refined design combines with superior performance, ensuring flawless installation on both wood and aluminum surfaces. Each Vicenza-style window shutter is artisanally produced in our workshops in the Dolomites, with rigorous quality controls at every manufacturing stage. The Black finish integrates perfectly with any architectural style, while the Iron structure ensures exceptional durability and weather resistance. The precision-engineered design guarantees smooth operation in all conditions. With its 10 cm dimension and 12mm diameter, this Vicenza-style hinge adapts perfectly to various installation scenarios, ensuring fluid and silent movements. Installation on both wood and aluminum surfaces is quick and straightforward, thanks to an optimized mounting system that guarantees stability and longevity. ## Italian Excellence **Artisan tradition and superior quality** Each Vicenza-style window shutter embodies 40 years of metal-working expertise. Our 100% Italian production ensures the highest quality standards and attention to detail that only Dolomites craftsmanship can deliver. Manufactured in the heart of these UNESCO World Heritage mountains, each piece carries the excellence of Italian mountain tradition. ## üí™ Unmatched Strength and Reliability **Guaranteed durability and performance** The premium Iron construction maintains its properties over time, even in challenging environmental conditions. Founder Rolando personally oversees every production phase, ensuring absolute quality standards are met for each piece leaving our workshop. ## ‚ú® Superior Design and Functionality **Style meets practicality** The professional Black finish complements any architectural style, while the ergonomic design facilitates installation and ensures optimal long-term performance. Artisanal care is evident in every detail, from precise measurements to superior surface quality. ### Why Our Customers Love It: - ‚úÖ Professional-grade Iron construction for maximum durability - ‚úÖ Perfect for both wood and aluminum applications - ‚úÖ Smooth, silent operation guaranteed - ‚úÖ Easy installation with precise mounting system
